original_definition: '4-star compartment' means a frozen compartment with a target temperature and storage conditions of - 18 °C and which fulfils the requirements for the freezing capacity;
generated_definition: '4-star compartment' means a compartment with a target temperature equal to or below 0 °c, as defined in annex iv, table 3.

Article 2: ‘frozen compartment’ means acompartment typewith atarget temperatureequal to or below 0 °C; that is a 0-star, 1-star, 2-star, 3-star or4-star compartment, as set out in Annex IV, Table 3;
‘freezer’ means a refrigerating appliance with only 4-star compartments;
‘frozen compartment’ means a compartment type with a target temperature equal to or below 0 °C; that is a 0-star, 1-star, 2-star, 3-star or 4-star compartment, as set out in Annex IV, Table 3;
‘freezer compartment’ or ‘4-star compartment’ means a frozen compartment with a target temperature and storage conditions of - 18 °C and which fulfils the requirements for the freezing capacity;
Article 11: ‘freezer compartment’ or ‘4-star compartment’ means a frozen compartment with a target temperature and storage conditions of - 18 °C and which fulfils the requirements for the freezing capacity;
between 1,15  and 1,56  for combi appliances with 3-or 4-star compartments (2), 1,15  for other combi appliances, 1,00  for other refrigerating appliances
